entry.title: Fwd: Bitcoin Core 0.12.0 release schedule
entry.summary: Marcel Jamin raised a question on the bitcoin-dev mailing list asking why Bitcoin versioning does not follow the SemVer spec. In response, Btc Drak explained that they do follow the SemVer spec using a.b.c for major versions and 0.12.0 as the next major version. Maintenance releases are labeled as 0.12.1 and so on, while release candidates are labeled as 0.12.0-rc1. The email thread also includes an HTML attachment that was scrubbed, so there is no further information available from it.
